snippet: The United Nations undersecretary of peacekeeping affairs, said Friday that he had suspended the salaries of several soldiers and police officers accused of sexual abuse.
abstract: United Nations official announces unprecedented step of suspending salaries of UN peacekeeping force members accused of sexual abuse against civilians in Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations undersecretary of peacekeeping affairs, said Friday that he had suspended the salaries of several soldiers and police officers accused of sexual abuse.

headline.main: U.N., Facing Abuse Scandal, to Withhold Pay of Peacekeepers Accused of Misconduct
headline.print_headline: U.N., Facing Abuse Scandal, to Withhold Pay of Peacekeepers Accused of Misconduct

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
